setOddsBet(int, int) - Method in class com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.LineBet
Abstract method requires implementing classes to define their own OddsBet, specifically the PassLine bet will set a LineOdds bet, and DontPass bet will set DontOdds bet.
